overview: Six sorority girls escape to the countryside for a weekend getaway with their new pledge, Dawn. But, unbeknownst to them, an evil force from World War II is waiting for them - Dawn's great-grandfather, a notorious Nazi murderer. When they conduct a s√©ance that awakens the spirit of the evil killer, their fun weekend getaway becomes a never-ending nightmare as they are are hunted down by the vengeful spirit.
title: Nazi Dawn
